column1: Title  : M810371 - Resident Households By Household Size, Annual
Average Household Size Among Resident Households (Persons)

A resident household refers to a household headed by a resident (i.e. Singapore citizen or permanent resident).  The household size refers to the total number of members in the household, including domestic workers.
AVERAGE HOUSEHOLD SIZE AMONG RESIDENT HOUSEHOLDS
TOTAL HDB DWELLINGS - Data for years prior to 2018 includes non-privatised Housing and Urban Development Corporation (HUDC) flats.
HDB 1- AND 2-ROOM FLATS - Includes HDB studio apartments.
